Pepperword is a no-nonsense tool to free you from password fatigue

NOTE: 

- This is NOT a password manager! Password managers are notoriously hard to get right (see https://www.usenix.org/system/files/conference/usenixsecurity14/sec14-paper-li-zhiwei.pdf).
- The Chrome extension is in beta. Please Email developer@pepperword to report issues.
